world.title: The Hero Battles the Dragon

world_bible.magic_rules: Magic exists but is rare and often tied to ancient artifacts or divine blessings. Only a few individuals can wield it, and its use is heavily regulated by the Church of the Silver Flame.
world_bible.tone: Epic fantasy with moments of grim realism and heroic sacrifice.

locations.name: Ironhold Village
locations.description: A fortified village nestled in the foothills, known for its blacksmiths and sturdy defenses. Smoke rises from chimneys, and the clang of hammers echoes through the air.

locations.name: Whispering Woods
locations.description: An ancient forest where the trees seem to murmur secrets. Travelers report strange lights and ghostly voices at night.

locations.name: Ashen Caves
locations.description: A network of volcanic caves filled with ash-covered ruins and fire-resistant creatures. The air is thick with sulfur.

locations.name: Moonlit Grove
locations.description: A serene grove bathed in perpetual moonlight, home to reclusive druids and enchanted flora.

locations.name: Dragon's Peak
locations.description: A towering mountain fortress where the ancient dragon Ignaroth resides. Its peak glows with molten fire, visible from miles away.

npcs.name: Garrick Ironfist
goals: Forge the finest weapons in the realm
npcs.refusal_style: I’ve got no time for fools—come back when you’ve got coin or purpose.

npcs.name: Elara Moonshadow
npcs.refusal_style: I cannot help you if your heart is not pure.

npcs.name: Sister Maribel
goals: Spread the teachings of the Silver Flame
npcs.refusal_style: May the Flame guide you—but only if you walk the righteous path.

npcs.name: Thorne Blackwood
npcs.refusal_style: The woods aren’t safe for unprepared travelers. Prove your worth first.

npcs.name: Borin Stoneheart
goals: Find rare gems in the Ashen Caves
npcs.refusal_style: I ain’t sharing my finds unless you pay up—or fight me.

npcs.name: Kael Emberforge
goals: Create a weapon capable of slaying Ignaroth
npcs.refusal_style: Bring me the right components, and I’ll craft you a miracle.

npcs.name: Liora Brightleaf
npcs.refusal_style: The grove does not welcome those who harm the earth.

world.starting_hook: You arrive in Ironhold Village just as news spreads: the dragon Ignaroth has awakened and scorched the eastern farmlands. The villagers look to you—the rumored hero—for salvation.
world.initial_quest: Speak to Garrick Ironfist about forging a weapon capable of piercing dragon scales.

main_quest.title: Slay the Dragon Ignaroth
main_quest.description: Main progression requires completing side quests and obtaining their reward items.
main_quest.objective: Finish side quests and collect key items: woodsmans_compass x1, druidic_amulet x1, dragonfang_blade x1
main_quest.reward_hint: Ignaroth’s hoard contains legendary treasures and the key to restoring peace.

side_quests.title: Whispers of the Woods
side_quests.description: Thorne Blackwood seeks aid in investigating eerie disturbances in the Whispering Woods. Ghostly apparitions have been scaring off hunters.
side_quests.objective: Collect three Ghostlight Moths and one petrified_oak_branch from the Whispering Woods and deliver them to Thorne.
side_quests.reward_hint: This compass never points north—it always guides you toward hidden paths.

side_quests.title: Sanctuary of the Grove
side_quests.description: Liora Brightleaf needs sacred ingredients to perform a ritual that will heal corrupted flora in the Moonlit Grove.
side_quests.objective: Gather two Moonpetal Blossoms and one dewdrop_crystal from the Moonlit Grove and give them to Liora.
side_quests.reward_hint: Wearing this amulet grants resistance to natural toxins and charms beasts.

side_quests.title: Heart of the Forge
side_quests.description: Kael Emberforge requires rare materials to complete his masterpiece—a blade capable of slaying dragons.
side_quests.objective: Retrieve one obsidian_heartstone and two Ashen Iron Ingots from the Ashen Caves and deliver them to Kael.
side_quests.reward_hint: This blade was forged in dragonfire and blessed by ancient runes.

recent_summaries: Player meets Garrick Ironfist for the first time in Ironhold Village. Garrick acknowledges the dragon threat and hints at the need for special materials to forge a proper weapon.
Garrick directs the player to Kael Emberforge in the Ashen Caves for the materials needed to forge the dragonfang_blade, advancing guidance on quest_side_03.
Player meets Elara Moonshadow for the first time in Ironhold Village. She introduces herself kindly and offers assistance.
Elara Moonshadow advises the player to visit either the Whispering Woods for quest_side_01 or the Ashen Caves for quest_side_03, based on their current objectives.
